DOC.brief_summary: The Analgesia Nociception Index ( ANI ) new unitless marker derive Heart Rate Variability spectral analysis , range 0 100 express parasympathetic tone . The ANI propose surrogate marker analgesia nociception balance . However , many perioperative factor medication , position , maneuver may influence ANI value may lead misinterpretation . Moreover ability ANI guide opioid dose never test . Therefore , aim study collect database perioperative factor study influence ANI .
